commenter_a: My mom who has stage 4 cancer... Tried juicing for almost a year, cutting out eating "real" food almost all together... Ended up doing more damage to her gut than good. Bodies are made to eat food and not meant to get over loaded with vitamins and nuetrints from juicing 40 carrots. I think in small doses it can be beneficial but not as a replacement
post_message: Even in Trump's America, juicing is still awful.
